topic.title: Perspectives George
topic.shortdesc: The detailed descriptions of the Editor, XSLT Debugger, XQuery Debugger, and Database perspectives.

body.p: An perspective is an interface layout geared towards a specific use. The interface uses standard interface conventions and components to provide a familiar and intuitive editing environment across all operating systems. There are several perspectives that you can use to work with documents in . You can change the perspective by selecting the respective icons in the top-right corner of or by selecting the perspective from the Window Open Perspective menu.
